document_data.name: Arrak
document_data.mainbody: '''Arrak''' was a veteran member of the [[Riders of Nesmé]] in [[1484 DR]].
document_data.History: Just after the start of the [[War of the Silver Marches]], Arrak was one of the Riders of Nesmé. He remained neutral in the dispute between his leader [[Varen]] and the young idealist [[Selinus]].
